articles.title: Big Asia merger creates $18 billion ride-hailing and e-commerce group - CNN International
articles.description: Gojek and Tokopedia — two of Indonesia's biggest startups — have agreed to merge to create the largest tech group in the country and one of the biggest ride-hailing and e-commerce companies in southeast Asia.
